sentences: I like to read books.
Reading books is something I enjoy.
She sings beautifully.
Her singing is absolutely gorgeous.

Playing soccer is their passion.
He enjoys cooking new recipes.
Cooking new recipes is his favorite hobby.
My sister dances gracefully.
Her graceful dance moves always mesmerize the audience.
We often travel to new places.
Exploring new places is something we do frequently.
They speak multiple languages.
Being multilingual is one of their impressive abilities.
I swim in the ocean every summer.
Swimming in the ocean during the summer is a tradition for me.
He runs marathons regularly.
Running marathons is a part of his routine.
She paints beautiful landscapes.
Creating beautiful landscapes through painting is her talent.
We enjoy watching movies together.
Watching movies together is our favorite bonding activity.
They play musical instruments skillfully.
Playing musical instruments skillfully is their forte.
I practice yoga every morning.
Practicing yoga is a daily ritual for me.
He writes insightful poems.
Writing insightful poems is his creative outlet.
She codes computer programs effectively.
Coding computer programs effectively is her expertise.
They study diligently for their exams.
Studying diligently for exams is their key to success.
I enjoy hiking in the mountains.
Hiking in the mountains is a thrilling experience for me.
He travels to different countries frequently.
Frequent travel to different countries is a part of his job.
